org.alljoyn.bus.ifaces

Interface Peer


  • @BusInterface(name="org.freedesktop.DBus.Peer")
public interface Peer
    The standard org.freedesktop.DBus.Peer interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String GetMachineId()
      Get the DBus machine id.
      void Ping()
      Send a ping message to a remote connection and get a method reply in response.

    • Method Detail

      • Ping

        @BusMethod
void Ping()
          throws BusException
        Send a ping message to a remote connection and get a method reply in response.
        Throws:
        BusException

      • GetMachineId

        @BusMethod
String GetMachineId()
                    throws BusException
        Get the DBus machine id. The machine id corresponds to the AllJoyn router's guid in this implementation.
        Returns:
        guid of local AllJoyn router
        Throws:
        BusException
